description: Detects the image load of VSS DLL by uncommon executables
author: frack113
name: Suspicious Volume Shadow Copy Vssapi.dll Load
query: (dll.path:*\\vssapi.dll AND (NOT ((((process.executable.text:("C:\Windows\explorer.exe" OR "C:\Windows\ImmersiveControlPanel\SystemSettings.exe")) OR (process.executable.text:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\\{*" OR "C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\*")))) OR (process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*")) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\ProgramData\\Package\ Cache\\*"))))
